attributes.action: Award NHS staff from 2020/21 a medal for Care for the UK during COVID
attributes.additional_details: Introduce and award all NHS staff working during 2020-2021 during the COVID19 pandemic for their dedication, compassion and care in exceptional circumstances. To celebrate their commitment and what they have all done for the UK
attributes.background: The Govt should, with the Royal Household introduce a new medal to acknowledge and celebrate the dedication to duty, the determination and outstanding care given by all NHS staff during the COVID pandemic .

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

NHS staff should be awarded a service medal for working through covid-19.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560402
